text:
Onir all praise for Raveena

Film-maker Onir says actor Raveena Tandon will leave the audience stunned with her performance in his upcoming directorial venture Shab .

Raveena, who made a guest appearance in last year’s Bombay Velvet , will be seen in a full-fledged role in this film.

“I genuinely feel she is an incredible actress and I wanted to work with her on this film for a long time. She will surprise everyone with her performance in the film,” Onir said. — PTI
title: The Hindu
